validation.subdomainRegex: Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens are allowed.
validation.subdomainMinLength: Subdomain must contain at least {min} characters.
validation.subdomainMaxLength: Subdomain must contain at most {max} characters.
validation.subdomainInvalidChars: Subdomain must only contain lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.
validation.subdomainMustStartAlphanumeric: Subdomain must start with a letter or number.
validation.subdomainMustEndAlphanumeric: Subdomain must end with a letter or number.

common.result: {count, plural, =0 {0 results} one {1 result} other {# results}}
common.item: {count, plural, =0 {0 items} one {1 item} other {# items}}

auth.loginWithEmail: Sign in with your email address
auth.loginWithUsername: Sign in with your beta.gouv username
auth.usernameValidation: Your username must contain only letters and dots. This is not your Beta email address.
auth.emailSentBody: A verification email has been sent to the main address linked to your Espace Membre account. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your email address.
auth.emailSentSpam: Also check your spam folder in Mailinblack or equivalent.
auth.oauthPrompt: Or sign in with an external provider:

preLoginOtp.title: OTP verification required
preLoginOtp.description: A code from your authenticator app is required before the sign-in link is sent.

twoFactor.title: Two-factor verification
twoFactor.description: Additional verification is required to access your account.
twoFactor.emailSent: A verification code has been sent to your email address.

401.title: Authentication error
401.headline: Unauthorized connection.
401.body: The account you tried to sign in with is not authorized (unknown, inactive, or filtered account). If you believe this is an error, please contact an admin.

403.title: Access denied
403.headline: Unauthorized operation.
403.body: You do not have the required permissions to access this page. If you believe this is an error, please contact an admin.

404.title: Page not found
404.headline: The page you are looking for cannot be found. We apologize for the inconvenience.
404.body: If you typed the web address in the browser, check that it is correct. The page may no longer be available.

500.title: Unexpected error
500.headline: Sorry, the service is experiencing a problem. We are working to resolve it as quickly as possible.
500.body: Try refreshing the page or try again later.

construction.title: Under construction
construction.headline: This service is under construction.
construction.body: We are working to make it available as soon as possible.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.headline: The service is currently under maintenance.
maintenance.body: We are working to restore it as quickly as possible.

home.title: Creating and showcasing your Startup d'État Roadmap has never been easier
home.description: With {brandName}, easily gather user feedback to effectively guide your product roadmap and improve your impact!

tenant.workspacesList: Here is the list of my workspaces
tenant.subdomainUniqueHint: The subdomain must be unique and must not contain spaces
tenant.nameHint2: The name of your workspace. It can be changed later.

general.title: General
general.seedEmpty: Your space is empty. You can initialize default data to get started quickly.
general.isPrivateHelper: Only tenant members can access the content
general.allowPostEditsHelper: Authors can edit their posts after publication
general.requirePostApprovalHelper: New posts must be approved by a moderator before being visible
general.allowPostDeletionHelper: Authors can delete their own posts
general.showRoadmapInHeaderHelper: A link to the roadmap appears in the main navigation
general.allowAnonymousVotingHelper: Non-logged-in visitors can vote on posts
general.customDomainHint: Leave empty if you don't use a custom domain
general.dnsInvalidHint: The domain {domain} exists but does not point to our server. Modify your DNS record:
general.dnsErrorHint: Unable to resolve domain {domain}. Add the following record in your DNS zone:
general.dnsErrorAlternative: Or, if your DNS provider does not support CNAMEs, an A record pointing to the IP of {expected}.
general.purgeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all data for this tenant (boards, posts, statuses, comments…)? This action is irreversible.
general.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this tenant? This action is irreversible.
general.seedBannerDescription: Initialize default data to get started: {boards} boards, {statuses} statuses, {extras}.
general.allowEmbeddingHelper: Allows embedding boards and roadmap on external sites via iframe.
general.allowEmbeddingPrivateWarning: Iframe embedding will not work if the site is private: visitors will not be authenticated in the iframe.

authentication.title: Authentication settings
authentication.oauthDescription: Enable external sign-in providers for this tenant.

api.title: API Keys
api.newKeyMessage: Your API key: {token}. Copy it now, it will not be displayed again.
api.noKeysDescription: No API key has been created for this tenant.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.noWebhooksDescription: No webhook has been configured for this tenant.

users.title: Users
users.name: Name
users.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this member?

invitations.title: Invitations
invitations.noInvitationsDescription: No invitation has been sent for this tenant.

board.title: Title
board.postSubmittedPending: Suggestion submitted. It will be visible after approval by a moderator.
board.titleMinLength: Title must be at least 3 characters long

post.titleMinLength: Title must be at least 3 characters long
post.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this post? This action is irreversible.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.description: Discover current and upcoming features. You can submit your ideas and vote for the proposals that interest you.
roadmap.emptyColumn: Share your feedback and come back later to discover what's new!
roadmap.empty: The roadmap is not yet available.

embed.embeddingDisabled: Embedding is not enabled for this space.

footer.contentDescription: {brandName} is a service developed by the Ecological Transition Accelerator of ADEME.
footer.license: Unless otherwise stated, all content on this site is under Apache License 2.0

serverErrors.cannotEditSelf: You cannot edit your own account.
serverErrors.cannotEditOwnRole: You cannot change your own role.
serverErrors.cannotEditOwnStatus: You cannot change your own status.
serverErrors.noPermissionToEdit: You do not have permission to edit this post.
serverErrors.noPermissionToDelete: You do not have permission to delete this post.
serverErrors.dataAlreadyExists: Data already exists for this tenant.
serverErrors.noActiveOwnerForSeed: No active owner found for this tenant. Initialization requires an owner.
serverErrors.emailAlreadyUsed: This email is already used by another account.
serverErrors.emLoginAlreadyLinked: This Espace Membre login is already linked to another account.
serverErrors.emMemberNotActive: This member is no longer active on Espace Membre.
serverErrors.emMemberNotFound: No member found with this login on Espace Membre.
serverErrors.accountNotLinkedToEm: Your account is not linked to Espace Membre.
serverErrors.emailAlreadySameAsEm: Your email is already the same as the Espace Membre one.
serverErrors.lastOwnerCannotDelete: You are the last owner of a tenant. Transfer ownership before deleting your account.

profile.title: My profile
profile.emUnlinkConfirm: Are you sure you want to unlink your account from Espace Membre?
profile.emUnlinked: Your account has been unlinked from Espace Membre.
profile.emLinkDescription: You can link your account to Espace Membre beta.gouv.fr to sync your information.
profile.emLoginHint: Your username on Espace Membre (e.g.: firstname.lastname)
profile.emVerificationSent: A verification email has been sent to {email}
profile.deleteWarning: Deleting your account is irreversible. Your contributions (posts, comments) will be kept anonymously.

security.title: Two-factor authentication
security.description: Add additional verification methods to secure your account.
security.emailDescription: Receive a verification code by email on each sign-in.
security.otpDescription: Use an app like Google Authenticator or Authy.
security.otpInvalidCode: Invalid code. Check and try again.
security.otpScanQr: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app:
security.otpVerifyLabel: Enter the code displayed in the app
security.passkeyDescription: Use a physical security key or biometric authentication.

security.title: Security
security.description: Configure security settings for platform users.
security.force2FAToggle: Force two-factor authentication for all users

emLinkConfirm.subject: Confirm your Espace Membre account link
emLinkConfirm.body: You have requested to link your account to Espace Membre ({username}).
emLinkConfirm.clickToConfirm: Click the following link to confirm:

magicLink.subject: Sign in to Roadmaps Faciles
magicLink.title: Sign in to your account
magicLink.body: Click the button below to sign in to Roadmaps Faciles.
magicLink.expiry: This link is valid for 24 hours.
magicLink.ignore: If you did not request this email, you can safely ignore it.

invitation.subjectOwner: You are invited as workspace owner
invitation.subjectUser: You are invited to join a workspace
invitation.title: Invitation to join a workspace
invitation.body: You have been invited to join a workspace{roleText}.
invitation.ignore: If you were not expecting this invitation, you can ignore this email.

moderation.title: Moderation
moderation.author: Author
moderation.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this post? This action is irreversible.
